name: Zillabyte
long_description:
Zillabyte is a cloud platform for data analysis.  Build apps, not infrastructure. 


We set up and maintain the infrastructure you need to analyze your data. All you need to do is develop your app locally and test it using the our CLI. When you need to scale, push to our servers. 

Easily add more functionality with components, modular code blocks that let you perform additional functions such as: geo coding, fraud analysis, and web scraping.

Use your own private datasets or plug into our off-the-shelf data, which includes a copy of the web. You can even combine the two and extract rich insights.
one_liner: Palantir for sales people

name: PhoneSys
long_description: Formerly Pingm.
one_liner: The Phone System for Sales Teams.

name: LeadGenius
long_description:
LeadGenius is the most efficient way to equip sales and marketing teams with custom B2B lead data at scale. Our data experts conduct ongoing research to automatically supply teams with accurate contact information and hard-to-acquire data points for your most valuable buyer personas.

By combining a remote global workforce, custom data, and machine learning, LeadGenius delivers the highest lead generation value in the marketplace.
one_liner: LeadGenius is an account-based marketing and lead generation…

name: Olark
long_description:
Olark is easy-to-use live chat software that lets you talk to customers on your website. 

Olark can help you track leads, drive sales, increase conversions, and provide great customer service. Real-time visitor information like login name, geographic location, purchase history and cart contents help you personalize every interaction and strengthen customer relationships. 

Sign up and start making your customers happier today!

Click here to sign up for a demo:
https://hello.olark.com/sales
one_liner: The best live chat software on the planet.  We help you build…

name: UserGems
long_description:
UserGems is an AI-driven prospecting solution for revenue teams to drive bigger pipelines, faster sales cycles, and larger deals.

Whenever your customers change their jobs, UserGems automatically surfaces them as new leads to your sales reps directly in Salesforce. This enables reps to close more deals, faster.

Leveraging machine learning, UserGems automatically identifies other prospects that match your best customers. That means you get a complete, up-to-date list of leads that match your ICP, persona and other key criteria so that reps spend less time sourcing leads, and more time selling.
one_liner: AI-powered sales solution based on your best customers

name: SalesSift
long_description:
SalesSift (formerly known as LeadFinch) is an intelligent lead-sourcing platform.

Our machine learning algorithm recommends the best new companies to target based upon the profile of your existing customers.
one_liner: Intelligent Lead Sourcing

name: Compgun
long_description:
Compgun is founded on the simple premise that sales commissions are simultaneously the sales organization's single biggest strategic lever and its largest expense.

At previous companies, Tim and Jake were amazed by the effectiveness of sales commissions in rallying teams around new strategic priorities and business objectives. At the same time, they were shocked by how primitively commission expenses are often managed. Most businesses administer commissions with Excel and email, making it nearly impossible for sales reps or their managers to track how they are pacing throughout the month, let alone which transactions were included in a previous period’s paycheck. Compgun’s mission is to stand the status quo on it’s head by providing real-time performance tracking and insight to every member of the sales org.
one_liner: Sales commission software that grows revenue.

name: GetAccept
long_description:
Close more deals by sending sales content with personalized video reminders, live chat and e-signature. We’re the Digital Sales Room platform for the best remote selling experience.

Today we are the fourth fastest growing SaaS company in the world and our platform is used in over 50 countries. From four founders, to over 200 employees worldwide in five years, and we still love every second of being a part of the journey. We have high hopes on what’s to come and could not be more excited for the future!
one_liner: Close deals faster. Digitally.

name: Apollo.io
long_description:
Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a lead intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by nearly 9,000 paying customers, from rapidly growing startups to some of the largest global enterprises. Our community-based approach to crowdsourcing data gives users maximum coverage while ensuring data accuracy. Our advanced algorithms and unique data acquisition methods help over 500,000 sales professionals enrich and analyze prospects' data to increase quality conversations and opportunities.

We have notable investors: Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners. We recently completed a Series B financing to fuel our next growth phase. We have reached and maintained profitability for the last 18 months.

Our growth and customer feedback set us apart from competitors.  Apollo had over one million sign-ups for its platform in the past year, and the number of weekly active users increased by over 400%.  We are a top-ranking G2 Crowd vendor in the Sales Intelligence, Lead Intelligence, Marketing Account Intelligence, and Sales Engagement categories.  Our highest scores are in the B2B data space for accuracy and ROI based on customer reviews.
one_liner: Apollo is the foundation of your entire go-to-market strategy.

name: Nova
long_description:
Nova helps sellers focus their time where it will have the greatest impact, by identifying next best actions across the entire pipeline. No more dropped balls, no funnel leakage.

Understand the fundamental flow of customers and revenue over time, what role each team member plays, and what needs to happen to achieve your big hairy audacious goals.
one_liner: Nova puts the power of AI to work for you, enabling a more continuous…

name: Saleswhale
long_description:
Saleswhale is an AI Sales Assistant that scales lead qualification via two-way email conversation. 

We look after the grunt work in Sales (ahem, admin) and bring only qualified leads and meetings to your Sales teams.

On top of automating data entry into your CRM, Saleswhale also conducts lead enrichment on your prospects (e.g. capturing their most up-to-date contact details), capture referrals and rejection reasons, as well as manage lead assignment.

Happy customers we support include Randstad, General Assembly and Verlocal - to name a few.

Interested to find out more about our AI Sales Assistant? Request a customised demo for your business on our website and we'll get back to you shortly!
one_liner: Saleswhale is an automated sales assistant that follows up with your…

name: Xkit
long_description: Xkit helps B2B SaaS app developers to deliver deep integrations to all of their customers' CRMs with a single build. From allowing your users to interact with your app from inside the CRM to interacting with existing data including custom fields, objects, and workflows, Xkit gives you a standard API that works for every customer's setup, no matter how customized.
one_liner: Universal CRM integration for B2B SaaS apps

name: Flockjay
long_description: Flockjay is an AI-powered platform for sales teams looking to get the knowledge they need, when they need it, to close more deals. We combine learning, content, and performance management in one place, so teams can effectively share best practices, coach faster and more effectively, and drive faster onboarding and productivity times.
one_liner: AI-driven learning, content, and coaching for sales teams

name: Demodesk
long_description: Demodesk provides AI-powered sales meeting software that summarizes your calls, automates CRM management, and delivers personalized, actionable sales coaching.
one_liner: AI-powered sales coaching

name: Letterdrop
long_description: Find warm leads from public and private conversations across the web, your calls, and CRM. Draft personalized outbound for hot leads. Nurture other leads with automated thought leadership.
one_liner: Book more meetings with conversational intent

name: Salesform
long_description: Salesform qualifies, routes, and converts inbound leads while 2-way syncing with your sales stack. Now, you can meet more target customers faster and leverage Salesform’s native enrichment to enhance routing rules and auto-replies for demo requests etc.
one_liner: Qualify, route, and convert more inbound leads

name: Laserfocus
long_description:
Laserfocus makes your sales process as simple as possible, but not simpler:

- Maximizes the time salespeople can spend on selling by showing them what they need to focus on
- Ensures that all data lands into Salesforce in the proper fields so you can make informed business decisions
one_liner: Implement streamlined Salesforce processes for agile GTM teams

name: Valienta
long_description:
Valienta helps Dropshippers in Colombia (and Latinamerica, eventually) to run the business, reduce costs and increase sales.

Through Valienta, our users have access to a marketplace of 160+ suppliers and thousands of products, to the possibility of shipping the orders to most of the country, and to multiple payment methods. 

In addition to that, our users are able to create their own e-commerce site for free, increase their advertising budget with our credit line, and improve their knowledge on sales and digital marketing with our educational content. 

We are working to democratize e-commerce by giving any person access to the capabilities that only established companies enjoy. We are working to become The Dropshipping Operating System.
one_liner: Helping Dropshippers in Colombia run the business and increase sales

name: Warmly,
long_description:
Step 1: We find you warm leads: contacts + companies that are showing interest on your website (via 6sense/Clearbit) and researching you around the web (via Bombora) but haven't converted yet.

Step 2: We then auto follow up via chat, email or LinkedIn. Depends what workflows you want to set up - we can AI chat with them on your website, auto AI email them via your sequence provider of choice, and/or auto AI linkedin sequence them. Your humans can verify everything before being sent too. 

Outcome: 10x more outbound than a human SDR, 3x reply rates since they're warm and more booked meetings (results shown in ROI dashboard). 

P.S. if you want to use humans: you can send 1-click warm intro requests via your network or live chat/video call them too.

This is the power of an autonomous sales orchestration platform and we have 100+ paying customers who can back it up.
one_liner: Autonomous sales platform to auto-email your warmest leads

name: Vogent
long_description: Vogent is an all-in-one platform for building voice agents by using intelligent building blocks, including IVR detection models, custom phone-ready LLMs, drag-and-drop conversational flow builders, and more.
one_liner: Build Voice AI Agents

name: Resquared
long_description:
Local businesses were the hardest B2B segment to reach, but account for over 60% firms in the U.S.
Our SaaS application has data on every local business that are easy to get in touch with using our specialized marketing automation tools and workflows. 
Resquared has been proven to save sales pro's over 3 hours per day and result in 53% stronger leads (case study on website).
one_liner: Marketing automation platform for selling to local businesses.

name: ROGER
long_description: Sending and signing contracts should be easy. So why is it that existing eSignature tools are all so janky? The last thing you need is a frustrating eSignature tool. That’s why we’re building Roger — a faster, simpler eSignature. Think of it like what Linear did to Jira.
one_liner: The Best Way to Sign Contracts Since Handshakes. Roger that.

name: Venu AI
long_description: Meet qualified leads in person by automating conference production with Venu AI. Host a conference and meet 100 qualified sales leads in person every 3 months fully automated with Venu AI.
one_liner: Meet qualified leads in person by automating conference production

name: Navattic
long_description: Navattic helps sales and marketing teams instantly create interactive product demos.
one_liner: Interactive product demos

name: PaletteHQ
long_description:
PaletteHQ makes it easy for B2B companies to calculate sales commissions and boost sales performance.

We built a SaaS platform that non tech people can implement in a day, connect to their CRM, accounting software or ERPs, and calculate commissions automatically instead of using excel spreadsheets or BI tools.
one_liner: Manage sales commissions and sales performance

name: FirstQuadrant
long_description: FirstQuadrant helps revenue teams move faster, stay organized, and close more deals, by streamlining the behind-the-scenes sales-work so nothing ever slips through the cracks.
one_liner: Sales AI that helps revenue teams move faster and close more deals.

name: Rivia.AI
long_description: Rivia.ai empowers marketing, sales, and demand generation teams to effortlessly generate and distribute interactive product demos within 10 minutes. Potential customers of SaaS brands can now personally engage with these self-guided product stories without direct sales interactions. With our user-friendly platform and intuitive dashboards, teams can effortlessly capture, customize, enhance, and share their demos without sound technical expertise. These interactive demos can seamlessly integrate into applications, websites, email campaigns, or ad campaigns.
one_liner: Interactive Product Demos

name: Geostar
long_description: Geostar is a platform that helps you generate more inbound revenue from AI search. Monitor your brand's AI visibility and get actionable insights to improve your search rankings.
one_liner: Geostar drives inbound for companies through search.

name: Coast
long_description: The first AI-powered demo platform designed to sell, market and implement technical products with ease. Our visual platform makes APIs more accessible and accelerates commercialization, enabling high-impact digital transformation for the world’s largest enterprises.
one_liner: Demo Platform for API-First Companies

name: Birdie
long_description: Birdie supercharges your sales team’s outreach productivity on LinkedIn. We do this by automating outreach workflows and providing comprehensive activity analytics. We help individual sales reps save time, while also helping sales managers get full visibility into their LinkedIn outreach efforts.
one_liner: Connect LinkedIn to your CRM to automate and track LinkedIn outreach.

name: SilkChart
long_description: SilkChart analyzes sales calls and measures how well playbooks are executed. It proactively surfaces coaching opportunities to managers, and provides reps with actionable feedback to close more deals.
one_liner: AI Sales Assistant to increase playbook adoption and win more deals

name: TigerEye
long_description: Think Snowflake + Looker + Perplexity.  We take care of your data lake and data modeling, providing one-click access to pipeline, revenue, funnel, and financial metrics with AI-driven insights. We also have out of the box tools for territories and segmentation.  Whether you need your first RevOps or Financial Analyst hire or want to supercharge your existing team, we've got you covered.
one_liner: AI analytics for GTM

name: Trellus
long_description:
Trellus delivers simple coaching prompts to your salespeople in real time as they speak to prospects. Prompts are delivered in response to what is happening in a conversation. The goal of these prompts is to get more reps achieving quota and to reduce the time it takes to start attaining quota.

Prompts are action-oriented steps toward empathetic listening and effective discovery. Examples include 'pause' (when talking too much), 'set next steps' (when wrapping up a call without them), and 'ask current state' (when encountering objections).

Trellus is backed by Y Combinator and founded by former MIT researchers.
one_liner: Real-time sales coach for SDRs

name: PromptLoop
long_description:
PromptLoop helps GTM teams automate account research and data enrichment at scale. We turn manual web scraping and qualification workflows into automated processes, enabling teams to enrich thousands of accounts with detailed company data and buying intent markers in minutes.

Why PromptLoop? Sales and marketing teams traditionally spend hours manually researching accounts or rely on outdated data providers. We automatically crawl and extract precise data points from company websites, social profiles, and public sources at 10% the cost of manual research, with built-in quality controls and strict sourcing. Teams can process 10k+ accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable qualification data tailored to your goals.
one_liner: AI agents to build B2B datasets

name: CoffeeAI
all_locations: Auckland, Auckland, New Zealand; Auckland, New Zealand
long_description:
Send targeted emails and LinkedIn messages that are as unique as the person receiving it. At scale.

📈 2x your response rates
Every aspect of your outbound email - from the pitch and opener to the call-to-action - is personalized.

Our AI uses trillions of bytes of data to create a deep understanding of your prospects to brew up the perfect message.

📨 Fully tailored in 10 seconds
Still spending 10 minutes researching a prospect? 🥱
CoffeeAI does your research for you - we use tons of different sources of information to create an email that feels unique and thought out.

Let us do the boring stuff so you can focus on building relationships - Or grab a coffee ☕
one_liner: Instant, hyper-personalized, AI-powered outreach messages

name: Blaze
long_description: Blaze uses AI and automation to scan millions of online signals to help modern companies target the right potential customers as soon as they show interest.
one_liner: Marketing automation for the modern world

name: Criya
long_description:
Criya AI, a Y Combinator and venture backed AI startup is an intelligent content system that reads across all your data sources and in 1-click produces stunning, hyper-personalized client-ready assets, by combining research, branding, authoring and engagement analytics.

Our AI Prospector replaces 85% of your account based marketing effort in 60 seconds. From market research to email/linkedin campaigns and landing page pitch decks, personalized for your specific buyer, we do it all in 1-click.
one_liner: AI that builds GTM assets in seconds

name: Lightmeter
long_description: Lightmeter is turn-key email outreach infrastructure for startups, combining network, platform, and expert advice. It integrates with sales tools like Apollo, replacing Google and Microsoft for email delivery. No change in tooling or workflow required. Lightmeter gets mail into inboxes, scalably and sustainably, while transparently reporting on performance. Plans from 50 to 7,500 outreach emails per day.
one_liner: Managed Sales Email Delivery For Cold Outreach

name: Zorba
all_locations: Saint Petersburg, FL, USA; Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description: Zorba is a real estate sales AI copilot, powered by proprietary vertical data, designed to help sales and customer success teams grow their client base and improve retention. It's used and trusted by both Fortune 500 and mid-market firms. With a multi-layered, LLM-driven engine, we’ve built a proprietary dataset of consolidated real estate entities, delivering real-time insights tailored specifically for the industry. Think Apollo or ZoomInfo, but AI-first and driven by real estate data
one_liner: AI copilot for real-estate sales teams, powered by proprietary data

name: Super Send
long_description: Super Send is a powerful outreach automation platform designed to streamline and scale your prospecting efforts across multiple channels, including email, LinkedIn, and Twitter. With features like dynamic personalization, email warming, inbox rotation, and advanced analytics, Super Send enables businesses to connect with leads efficiently while maintaining a human touch. Whether you’re running A/B tests, managing campaigns, or optimizing deliverability, Super Send provides the tools you need to maximize engagement and grow your business
one_liner: Super Send automates personalized outreach across email, LinkedIn,…

name: Demo Gorilla
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Seattle, WA, USA; Remote
long_description:
Demo Gorilla is a browser extension for live SaaS demos that tells your sales team exactly what to say to sell your product.

Keep everyone on the same page with the best customer stores, competitive talking points and feature explanations. Collect insights across product, engineering, marketing, and sales experts to ensure your sales team always knows exactly what will close this deal.

- Automatically get relevant talking points for the part of the product you're on and who you're talking to
- Track notes and metrics back in to your CRM
- Share slides and images in line while demoing to set the stage
- Clean up your UI to keep attendees focused
one_liner: Make all your live SaaS demos impactful: close more ARR faster

name: Ponyrun
long_description:
Ponyrun evaluates people for you. We help you answer questions like: Should you sell to them? Are they a good fit for your product? Should you interview them? 

Its easy to use. Give it a search URL or a list of people. Tell Ponyrun what you want to evaluate the person on. And Ponyrun will go through the person's information (e.g. LinkedIn), and evaluate them.
one_liner: Automate prospect research at scale

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools. We make it easy for developers to integrate with your customer’s CRMs, Sales Engagement, Marketing Automation, Chat, Dialers, and more. Integrate in different ways customized for your use cases: 

- Speed: Use our Unified APIs to roll out many integrations quickly through a common data model and unified interface.
- Depth: Use our actions API to build deeper integrations when working with entities custom to each app.
- Ease: Use ETL to let us handle pulling and pushing customer data to your DB
- Extensible: Support any integrations through our open-source integrations library

Breadth and depth, make your integrations limitless.
one_liner: Developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools

name: Kenobi
long_description:
Kenobi is personalizing the internet. Your marketing site is your front desk to the internet, but its content has to be applicable to all of your ICPs and potential visitors, usually resulting in fragmented and blunt brochure content.

Kenobi acts as your concierge, ensuring each of your visitors receives content that is tailored to _them_ so that they actually convert and progress along your sales journey. You can install Kenobi with one `<head />` tag in your site's markup -- everything else is taken care of using our AI research + content generation pipeline.
one_liner: Personalize your landing site for each vistor, in one line of code.

name: Nara
long_description: We make it easy for small and medium businesses to build an AI sales agents for their websites and social media, augmenting their sales capacity. This assistant provides personalized shopping recommendations to customers and is available 24/7 to answer their questions.
one_liner: Answer 70% of your support and sales questions. Instantly

name: Wolfia
long_description:
We help sales, security, and support teams get answers in seconds without depending on subject-matter experts.

Our AI agent connects to every source that already holds the truth (Google Drive, Notion, Slack, email, website, trust center, SOC 2 docs, etc.). It keeps that knowledge graph fresh on its own and drafts, validates, and formats responses to customer questions, security questionnaires, and RFPs, all in the background, so your team just reviews and ships.
one_liner: We help sales and security teams answer customer questions

name: Ciro
long_description:
Meet your new AI prospecting agent — powered by Ciro.

Sales reps today juggle a lot — hundreds of daily cold calls, LinkedIn follow-ups, email sequences — all while trying to sound human and build real connections. 

Before any of that, they spend hours trying to figure out who to reach out to.

It’s a constant battle between speed and quality — and under pressure, speed usually wins.

But in the age of AI, we don’t think that tradeoff should exist.

That’s why we built Ciro Autopilot — to help you build high-quality lead lists, faster than ever.
one_liner: Build the perfect prospect list in <5min with AI

name: Penguin AI
long_description: Penguin AI help B2B companies identify the exact PEOPLE and companies visiting their site and auto-sequences them in a personalized way; book more demos without scaling headcount.
one_liner: AI Sales Rep for Website Intent Signals

name: Truva
long_description: Truva handles the busywork intelligently saving your sales team hours each week, so they can focus on what matters most - building and closing deals. Many teams have seen up to 25% increase in sales where Truva's AI agents automated tedious tasks such as email follow up, CRM data entry, and process optimizations.
one_liner: Sell more. Grind less with AI agents.

name: Boundo
long_description: Boundo uses generative AI to replace SDRs. Tell our platform who you're looking for, and it will find and contact high quality sales leads in a fully automated way! We’ve tuned our models to write near-human outbound sales emails with proven conversion. Best of all, we're using our own tool to do all of our sales.
one_liner: Using generative AI to 10x outbound sales, all on autopilot!

name: CustomerOS
long_description:
CustomerOS uncovers high-fit leads who are engaging directly with your brand but not yet in your sales funnel. By lead scoring your pipeline against your ICP we build data-driven profiles of your best customers and provide a real-time ICP-fit indicator so your team doesn't waste time on low-value/high-cost leads. This ensures you're spending your CAC acquiring customers who are primed to renew year after year and expand as they grow.

The Top 10% of SaaS companies generate 87% of all market returns. CustomerOS gives you the data and tooling to compete with the top 10%.
one_liner: Uncover high-fit leads already silently engaging with your brand

name: Mocke
long_description: AI simulated email campaigns to reveal the real reasons your prospects ignore you. Stop guessing and start iterating.
one_liner: Finally, know why your leads don't reply to email campaigns.

name: Paragon AI
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; San Juan, San Juan, Puerto Rico; Remote
long_description: Paragon AI is a tool for sales representatives which automatically turns call recordings into structured information that directly updates the CRM. Instead of spending hours going over call recordings to pull out key information to populate the CRM, sales representatives can focus their time doing what they do best and sales leaders can rest assured that pipeline data is up to date.
one_liner: Turns your sales calls into CRM data, automatically.

name: Namecard.ai
long_description:
In the fast-paced world of business, your success often hinges on who you know. But finding the right people to grow your business shouldn't be left to chance or countless hours of networking.

At Namecard.ai, we're transforming how businesses connect and grow. We harness the power of generative AI to understand your unique business DNA - your goals, challenges, strengths, and needs. We then connect you with the right people who can truly catalyze your growth.
one_liner: AI-powered business matchmaking

name: Manatee
all_locations: College Park, MD, USA; Rockville, MD, USA; Remote
long_description: We let you see everything about how prospects interact with your demos, then convert them into paying customers.
one_liner: DocSend for demos.

name: Relate
long_description: Relate is a modern Sales and Marketing CRM platform for B2B companies.
one_liner: All-in-One Sales and Marketing CRM for B2B teams

name: Avina
long_description:
Avina uses AI agents to find prospects that are ready to buy, surface the warmest ones to your team and automate outreach to the rest.

Compare us to tools like Unify or Common Room.
one_liner: GTM signals engine for sales teams. Automate warm outbound with AI.

name: rift
long_description:
rift is a sales platform that helps salespeople focus on what they do best – selling.

On rift, you can accomplish everything you have to do to close deals - send emails, run sequences, cold call, and book meetings.

The difference is that rift automates everything in between. If your data is a bit messy - we’ll clean it for you. If it takes a long time to figure out who to reach out to - our platform will flag the most likely leads to engage. If your emails are landing in spam - rift will set up the infrastructure to make sure that you're not landing in spam because of incorrect setup.

Sales teams today spend 70% of their time not selling. rift’s mission is to give that time back to them so they can focus on selling again.
one_liner: The sales platform built to help you focus

name: Bluebirds
long_description:
Bluebirds helps GTM teams automate outbound targeting with signals. Save your reps 2 hours a day from list building and prospect research. 

Create custom intent signals from trusted data sources in 3 minutes. Bluebirds continuously scans your market and delivers ready-to-prospect Leads to your CRM.
one_liner: Automate outbound with signals

name: Suger
long_description: The cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, and GCP have become the App Store for B2B software products. It’s growing close to 100% year-over-year since it gives software sellers access to cloud budgets and makes procurement 40% faster. The core problem is the cloud marketplace is hard to navigate and requires an upfront technical investment without knowing the expected ROI. Suger eliminates the need to reinvent the wheel with your own engineering resource or spend a fortune on consulting-based solutions.
one_liner: Salesforce for Cloud marketplaces on AWS, Azure, GCP

name: Floworks
long_description:
Floworks (https://floworks.ai) is building a suite of AI employees that helps business to run several business functions such as sales, on autopilot.

Our flagship product, Alisha is an AI SDR that performs the full outbound SDR job- fully autonomously without any human involvement. 

Our AI SDR Alisha can perform ICP research, find out prospect lists, research about each prospect across 180 web sources, write highly personalized emails to each, follow and engage, and finally coordinate like a human to book sales calls.

Businesses using Alisha get 3 key benefits:
1.⁠ ⁠They get 12x output from your existing sales team.
2.⁠ ⁠⁠Are able to scale to 8 figure revenues with just a single AE.

Alisha is built on our proprietary function calling model ThorV2 (https://floworks.ai/research) that outperforms both Claude 3 and GPT-4 function calling in accuracy by 13% and 43% respectively. At the same time, ThorV2 uses only a fraction of the cost (<40%) and time/latency (<78%) as the other models.

Our second AI employee, Ashley, is an AI Executive Assistant that keeps you reminded and on top of your on your schedule. Works on your whim- just command Flowy to book a meeting, move a meeting or write a email, and it does without you having to navigate through every apps. You can teach Flowy specific workflows such as ‘inform me immediately if i receive a reply from xyz’, “show my unread emails from last day every morning 7am” and much more

Our third AI employee, Romona is a helpful AI Revenue Operations Manager that keeps track of every CRM data updation on behalf of your team, works on your instruction to update notes, next steps, MEDDIC after every call, does periodic CRM reporting and much more.
one_liner: Hire the best AI Sales employees | AI SDR | AI RevOps | AI EA

name: Echo
long_description: Echo helps B2B founders know exactly what to say during a sales call to win the business, including how to respond to any objections that come up. We do this by generating a personalized sales playbook based on best practices and providing an intuitive interface for following its guidelines in real time.
one_liner: Founder-led sales co-pilot for B2B startups.

name: Coldreach
long_description:
Coldreach helps sales teams find ready-to-buy leads, by monitoring public signals *custom* to your product. 

For example, it can find who's hiring their first accountant, so an accounting automation product can hit them with a targeted message at the right time. 

Public data sources (job postings, news articles, 10-k reports, etc.) tell a lot about a company’s priorities and the problems it faces. We train AI sales agents to monitor them and find who needs your help and why. Sales teams know who'd thank them for a cold email/call now, and can sound relevant without hrs of manual research. 

Typically, targeted outreach yields 2-8x higher booking rate compared to random outreach.


**Example intent signals we track**:
- Bookkeeping automation product: Monitor who starts to hire human to manually enter invoices
- Compliance product: Monitor who recently onboarded a new Compliance Analyst
- CRM integrations: Monitor who starts to hire engineers experienced in Salesforce API.
one_liner: Find the best leads with custom intent signals

name: Hindsight
long_description:
Hindsight provides teams with insights that help increase win rates

1. Monitor competitor moves across the web using AI agents
2. Collect feedback from buyers with win-loss interviews
3. Deeply analyze your calls and CRM data

Hindsight combines these insights into dashboards, battlecards, and other enablement materials for sales teams.
one_liner: Competitive Intelligence that's actually intelligent

name: Common Paper
long_description:
Common Paper is a contracting platform that helps startups close deals with their customers faster and with less risk.

We create standard, open-source contracts for commercial transactions, including NDAs, DPAs, and sales agreements. These are analogous to the SAFE, but are between customers and vendors rather than investors and startups. The standardized format means that data within contracts is structured from inception. 

We build software for managing standard contracts, accelerating sales cycles, and making the data within the contracts programmatically accessible to other business systems.

Thousands of people have downloaded our standard contracts, and 63% of the contracts on our system close within 24 hours.
one_liner: The SAFE for commercial contracts

name: Fabius
long_description:
Fabius helps sales leaders understand and improve their reps' performance by analyzing customer calls with AI. Companies like Airbyte and Fermat use us to score every call and identify when a customer hasn’t been properly qualified.

Fabius helps drive decisions within sales, including:
- Disqualify a deal: Reps work on deals that will never close. We identify the deals that won't be successful and make sure reps don't waste time on them.
- Need to strengthen the business case for a deal: We tell managers and reps when a deal has a weak business case and show them how to uncover more business value in the deal.
one_liner: AI to improve Sales Calls

name: Persana AI
long_description: Persana AI is an intelligent sales copilot powered by our own custom fine tuned models. We ingest all of a company’s internal CRM data, combine it with public web sources on each of their prospects, and give them insights on who to prioritize based on crucial intent signals so that they capture ripe opportunities . For instance, when a lead visits the company website or gets funding, Persana AI can notify the sales team and generate an email to send out right away.
one_liner: Alternative to Clay | Intelligent sales agent with 75+ data sources

name: Adri AI
long_description:
Adri is built for enterprises that are buying AI. 

Our patented software monitors the AI vendor's infrastructure and detects any intentional or accidental misuse of your proprietary data.

We help you buy AI that you can trust.
one_liner: Vanta for AI

name: HockeyStack
long_description:
HockeyStack improves sales outcomes for B2B companies by helping them record and understand every interaction their customers have with their marketing, sales reps, CSMs, and products. 

We map every customer touchpoint from ad impression to closed won and to upsell using our own tracking script and native integrations to the B2B GTM tech stack. 

Building this source of truth allow us to give companies previously hidden insights that generate incremental revenue, such as:

- Deploy marketing budget: "Launch this ad campaign to this audience to generate $XM in pipeline"
- Target the right accounts with the right messaging: "These accounts have the highest likelihood to convert, put them on this email sequence"
- Convert more of the pipeline: “Pied Piper hasn't visited the site for 8 days; give Jim a phone call”
one_liner: The operating system for inbound B2B revenue

name: Twenty
long_description: Building a modern alternative to Salesforce: https://github.com/twentyhq/twenty
one_liner: Open Source CRM

name: Hyperbound
long_description:
Hyperbound pioneered AI Sales Roleplay technology and is the trailblazer behind the AI Sales Roleplay category for mid-market/enterprise revenue teams.

We provide human-like roleplays with AI buyers customized for your ICP, giving reps more at-bats and leveling up their business acumen in half the amount of time.

We then inspect live calls to certify that reps are mirroring your top performers and generate personalized AI feedback and targeted roleplays to tackle performance gaps.
The goal is faster ramp times, more pipeline, higher win rates, increased ACVs, more consistent performance across your team, and more time for your managers.

Interested in trying it out today? Start a free demo simulation at hyperbound.ai and contact us at founders@hyperbound.ai for next steps.
one_liner: AI Sales Performance OS

name: Venta AI
long_description: Venta AI supports sales teams in Europe with targeted outreach. Our AI employee can access the best companies and contact details and carry out automated outreach in compliance with EU regulations.
one_liner: The compliant AI colleague for sales teams in Europe

name: Arcimus
long_description:
We track thousands of signals across the world to find people who need your product, just tell us who your perfect customer is and we'll get you a list. (Don't limit yourself to basic filters like revenue or size)

Some things we can track: 
- Brand new online degree programs
- Law firms expanding
- Companies hiring their first sales reps

really anything, try us 😎
one_liner: Find who needs your product

name: Unhaze
long_description:
Unhaze is a revenue optimization tool for mid-market B2B teams.

Unhaze finds the leads that sales teams are most likely to close right now. We do this by analyzing previous deals and continuously monitoring for similar traits among all our collected company data.

By focusing on the right leads (at the right time!), we can almost double win rates.
one_liner: The right leads at the right time for B2B sales

name: Surface Labs
long_description:
Surface Labs helps B2B companies capture, qualify, and convert inbound leads through intelligent contact forms. We replace tools like HubSpot Forms, Zapier, and Chili Piper with a single platform that embeds on any site with one line of code.

Our AI agents handle lead capture, enrichment, routing, follow-up, and CRO testing — automating what used to require full marketing ops teams. Customers see a 30% lift in conversions in under 2 weeks, and our partial response capture feature collects 50% more emails from form drop-offs.
one_liner: Building the AI-powered marketing ops platform that turns website…

name: Inventive AI
long_description:
Inventive is an AI-powered RFP & questionnaire response management platform that drives 70%+ efficiency in sales response workflows.

**Core benefits and features:**

- **10X Faster Drafts With Highly Accurate Responses**: Using Inventive’s proprietary AI-system you can get first drafts 10 times faster, with accurate responses rooted in your knowledge sources, that you and your team can collaborate on to refine.
- **Single Hub for All Your Knowledge Sources:** Inventive offers a centralized hub for all your knowledge sources. You can upload previous RFPs and relevant documents; integrate with your internal data systems such as gDrive. Sharepoint & more; upload Q&A from legacy tools or spreadsheets; and even add information from your websites.
- **Fight Stale Content With AI Content Manager:** Inventive’s AI content manager proactively flags conflicting content by identifying issues within your sources, so you only use fresh and relevant content in your responses.
- **Higher Productivity & Competitive Advantage With AI Agents:** Inventive offers a suite of AI agents designed to boost productivity and give you a competitive advantage. These agents can help with researching competitors, brainstorming ideas, and more.

Built by a customer-obsessed team comprising an ex-exec from a Fortune 500 company and ex-AI team from Google & Stanford. Backed by top Silicon Valley investors including YCombinator.
one_liner: AI Agents For RFP and Questionnaire Response Automation

name: Fiber AI
long_description:
Fiber AI helps GTM and recruiting teams build surgical TAM lists that AI SDRs/AI BDRs can't create. While AI sales automation tools fail at targeted prospecting, we provide advanced filters (headcount growth tracking, fundraising data, education filters, Google Maps scraping) to build niche audiences for multi-channel outbound (i.e. things like LinkedIn ads, Google ads, Meta ads, cold email, cold calling, invites to Luma events, and other outbound). Our 16+ provider waterfalls deliver high quality emails and phone numbers, and we offer a 0% email bounce guarantee, making this a risk-free offer for customers (something that Apollo.io, Clay.com, Hunter.io, People Data Labs, LeadMagic, Prospeo, FindyMail, Wiza, Icypeas, FullEnrich, Datagma, Dropcontact, and others can't and won't ever offer).

The problem with AI sales copilots and AI sales automation is that they can't build targeted lists. Success in modern sales requires niche, surgical targeting - then executing personalized outbound across multiple channels. That's where Fiber AI excels.

Our platform consists of 3 core components:

First, building precise lists that AI SDRs can't match (replaces broad AI BDR spraying, unfocused AI sales automation, and lead generation software). We are able to filter on things like:

1) Headcount Growth Tracking: Find scaling companies with monthly, quarterly, yearly employee growth metrics
2) Deep Filtering: Fundraising history, Ivy League alumni search, promotion patterns, office expansions
3) Intent Signals: Open jobs data, hiring patterns, technographic filters, company metadata search
4) Custom Searches: Education filters ("MIT grads excluding summer programs"), bio keyword search, LinkedIn profile headlines
5) Google Maps Intelligence: Local business scraping with radius search, rating filters, geofencing
Multi-Channel Export: Build lists optimized for LinkedIn ads, Google ads, Meta ads, cold calling scripts, email sequences, or Luma event invites

We are the best TAM builder (TAM list builder) to help you find your ICP (build an ICP list). This precision targeting is why top SDRs and recruiters use us instead of generic AI SDR or AI recruiting tools (for cold outreach).

Second, email deliverability requires rigorous validation of data. Our 0% Bounce Guarantee is something that no other vendors offer, and we are able to offer this because we have invested in a rigorous infrastructure that will clean and validate emails and phone numbers. While tools like Smartlead, Instantly, Lemlist, and Reply.io help you send emails, they can't prevent bounces that destroy your domain reputation. Our edge comes from:

1) Using 16+ Validator Waterfall: Unlike Clay.com (which only checks the first source in an email waterfall or phone waterfall) or basic tools like ZeroBounce, DeBounce, NeverBounce, or EmailListVerify, we run every contact through ALL validators
2) True Email Bounce Detection: Our contact waterfalls includes email grabbers, email and phone databases, email validators, bounce detectors, and phone verification services
3) Phone Validation Too: Similar waterfall for phone numbers - direct dial verification, mobile validation
4) Industry-Specific Waterfalls: We change the vendors we use in our waterfalls depending on the industry of contacts that we are fetching, leading to more accurate contact data
5) 0% bounce promise. If an email bounces, DM us for instant refund. No forms, no fuss.

Apollo.io (Apollo email, Apollo phones, Apollo contact), Hunter.io (Hunter), Dropcontact.com (Dropcontact), Wiza.com (Wiza), ContactOut, Lusha all cannot offer this 0% email bounce guarantee because their data quality is inconsistent and poor, and doing so would make them bleed money. We can, because our process is highly sophisticated and customers get <1% bounce rates on average (which we refund the credits for due to our 0% email bounce guarantee) 

Third, we use AI Agents for data extraction from unconventional data sources like:

1) Conference attendee lists for targeted event follow-up
2) Google Maps data for local business outreach
3) Custom company research for personalized messaging
4) Competitor customer identification for strategic targeting
5) LinkedIn Sales Navigator scrapes that allow us to get companies from LinkedIn sales nav, followers of a company, and more (i.e. LinkedIn scraper, Sales Navigator export, LinkedIn export, LinkedIn data export)

This allows us to find precise leads that are not present in traditional contact databases, and specialize to different use cases and verticals. 

We have B2B company data on 60 million B2B companies and 800 million B2B contacts (i.e. B2B database), sourced from dozens of data providers (i.e. think sources like BuiltWith, Crunchbase, LinkedIn, ZoomInfo, SemRush, Apollo data, and more). This allows you to precisely segment your audience by the companies you care about and exclude everyone else. Our audiences are dynamic (i.e., account based marketing, account based sales, ABM like Clearbit, 6sense, Demandbase), meaning we continuously look for prospects matching your targeting criteria and add them to your audience to run our automated outbound sales sequences. This automates manual workflows you might be running on platforms like Clay or Persana. You can also create an audience once based on intent signals (i.e., GTM or go-to-market signals, sales intelligence) and put your outreach on autopilot.

This is why RevOps, sales, growth, recruiting, and outbound teams choose us over AI SDR platforms (artisan ai, 11x, amplemarket, reply.io, unify gtm, penguin ai, regie ai, aisdr, artisan sdr, outreach io, and warmly ai), existing lead databases (email enrichment, bulk email finder, or phone enrichment tools like apollo, zoominfo, leadIQ), and contact enrichment tools (clay, persana ai) that promise automation and enrichment but deliver poor results. Real sales and recruiting success comes from targeted lists and multi-channel outbound, not generic AI outreach.
one_liner: AI TAM list builder for targeted prospecting, outbound & recruiting

name: AiSDR
long_description:
AiSDR automates sales prospecting. Our software uses AI to automatically write and send sales emails, once a prospective customer engages – we then automatically correspond and book meetings with them. 

AiSDR's sales emails have an average response rate of 7.1%, which is already on par with the industry response rate from emails written by humans. 

We are aiming to replace over 600k SDRs, that cost US companies $48B a year.
one_liner: AI sales prospecting. Replace your SDR with AiSDR

name: Artisan
long_description:
At Artisan, we’re building real AI employees - not copilots, not assistants, but autonomous teammates.

Our first, Ava, is an AI BDR. She finds and researches leads, writes emails in customers’ tone of voice, runs outbound sequences, self-optimizes, and manages email deliverability infrastructure. She learns, adapts, and improves over time - just like a human would.

Human team members use Artisan as their primary working platform, replacing a sprawling stack of sales tools, and have Artisans working alongside them.

We went through Y Combinator (W24) and have raised $35M+ from top investors. We’re at $6M+ ARR, with hundreds of customers including Remote, Quora, and SumUp.

We’re currently working on Ava 2.0, pushing the boundaries of what an AI employee can do. And we're hiring.
one_liner: AI employees called Artisans, starting with an AI BDR

name: Ecliptor
one_liner: AI and Embeddings.

name: Topo
long_description:
We are helping B2B companies reach the right leads with an AI sales agent custom trained on their knowledge.



The goal is to reproduce the behavior of a sales top performers:

- They know the product, the industry, the pain points, and the company's value proposition perfectly (trained on datas from your knowledge base, calls transcript, CRM...). 

- They will find the right leads, ready to buy, based on buying signals in the industry-specific channels (Linkedin, G2, Github...) or on the company's website visitors.


That's exactly what the agent can do!

Think of it as an expert SDR in your industry, ramp up in minutes.
one_liner: AI sales agent custom trained for each company to reach the best leads

name: Meticulate
long_description:
Meticulate is a new type of prospecting engine that uses GenAI to radically improve how revenue teams can find and track their prospects.

We help sales teams find complex customer profiles like “commercial real estate groups focused on hospitality that own over 10 full-service hotels in North America” and track custom buying signals like “recently hired a DevOps leader”. Meticulate is a seed-stage startup backed by leading AI investors like Y Combinator and Link Ventures.
one_liner: Powerful prospecting engine for revenue leaders

name: Speck
long_description: Speck helps professionals in back-to-back calls on their meeting tasks. It automates pre-call research, listens to every word, learns, and creates meeting notes, follow-ups, action items based on how you do them.
one_liner: Ambient Agent for Your Computer

name: crmCopilot
long_description:
crmCopilot – Stop with the grunt work. Spend more time with customers.

Are you juggling multiple accounts and conversations? Are you worried about missing follow-ups or letting opportunities fall through the cracks? Are you spending hours every week updating your CRM… but still struggle with duplicates, stale data, and unreliable reports? Does just thinking about Salesforce give you anxiety?

Worry no more.

crmCopilot is an AI assistant purpose-built to support front-office teams by taking care of tedious tasks and delivering proactive insights:

-- Automated CRM Updates: crmCopilot intelligently detects when your CRM needs attention, drafting precise and timely updates that you can approve with a single click - transforming hours of manual data entry into mere seconds.

-- Task Management: crmCopilot proactively identifies your next steps, important follow-ups, and critical tasks. It continuously tracks deadlines and action items, ensuring nothing is forgotten or overlooked.

-- Global Search: Quickly find crucial information across all your emails, CRM data, calendar events, call recordings, documents, and notes, all from a single, intuitive search interface. No more time wasted hunting down important details.

crmCopilot customers close more deals and build stronger relationships. You’ll spend more time with customers, never miss a task or opportunity, and walk into every meeting fully prepared with every customer interaction at your fingertips. 

Give Salesforce the AI upgrade it deserves. Try crmCopilot today.
one_liner: Give Salesforce the AI upgrade it deserves

name: Centralize
long_description: Centralize helps revenue teams operationalize multi-threading and drive warm pipeline. Reps at companies like Sendoso, Ethena, and Navattic use us to automatically map stakeholders, track evolving account priorities, and fill contact gaps by leveraging their networks for warm intros.
one_liner: The AI-powered deal collaboration platform for high ACV revenue teams

name: Conduit
long_description:
Conduit is the AI agent platform that drives conversational outcomes across support and sales.

Customer conversations are the backbone of every business. Mass-market consumer businesses spend nearly a third of their working hours calling and texting customers. Conduit turns those conversations into an engine for conversions, revenue, and cost savings. 

We enable operators across real estate, financials, and services, to build and deploy AI agents that perform better than your best employee. Our modular platform enables automation for the most complex, high-volume conversational workflows.
one_liner: Conversational AI agents for Support and Sales

name: Openmart
one_liner: Local business data intelligence platform

name: Terrakotta
long_description: Terrakotta is a power-dialer that lets sales reps leave AI-generated voicemails.  Our first customers are Commercial Real Estate brokerages that use Terrakotta to clone their brokers voices, dial prospects and when no one answers, leave an A/B tested, personalized voicemail that gets a callback.
one_liner: AI platform for phone-first sellers

name: Veles
long_description:
Veles – The Sales Calculator. Veles empowers sales reps to deliver pricing effectively and craft dynamic options that maximize deal size. By integrating seamlessly with CPQs And CRMs, Veles makes every sales rep a top performer. 

Key Features:

✅ SaaS Pricing Calculator: Easily standardize pricing and track sales rep behavior in one intuitive platform.

✅ Standard Deal Definition: Define sales strategies and terms to expedite onboarding and maintain negotiation consistency.

✅ Performance Analytics: Gain insights into sales rep behaviors that lead to closed-won deals through comprehensive deal scoring.

✅ Alignment & Optimization: Foster team alignment by sharing negotiations and strategies for successful negotiation calls.
one_liner: The Sales Calculator

name: Yarn
long_description:
Yarn uses AI to help founders, salespeople, and marketers make product and sales videos.

Teams are using Yarn to make sales collateral, launch videos, use-case demos, training guides, and feature updates for Twitter and LinkedIn.

No video experience needed and everything looks great out-of-the-box – think Notion, Linear, or Stripe-quality – but branded for your team.

The magic really comes from AI (TTS, CV, LLMs) – so you can zip through 5x faster than a Loom.
one_liner: Make sales and marketing videos with AI.

name: Apten
long_description: Apten is an AI agent that automates sales and marketing for B2C companies across text, call, and email. It's able to respond at any time across all 3 channels, dynamically follow-up with personalized messages at the right time, and take actions with your systems/tools.
one_liner: Omnichannel AI agents that engage leads across SMS, voice, and email

name: Pinnacle
long_description: Pinnacle is an API for RCS, the new standard for SMS for app-like text messages.
one_liner: API & SDK for RCS (the next-generation of texting)

name: Soff
long_description: Manufacturers use Soff to grow revenue by auto-creating quotes and automating communication with customers & suppliers.
one_liner: AI for Manufacturers Sales

name: Origami
long_description:
At Origami, we’re building the most powerful AI Research Agents.

Our Agents work 24/7 like human SDRs: finding new leads, enriching data, and updating your CRM — so your team can focus on selling.

Founded in 2024, we became Y Combinator's fastest growing startup and accelerate the work of hundreds of reps across top companies like CBRE, Rho, and Remote.com.
one_liner: Agents that find your perfect customers

name: Verbiflow
long_description: Research on autopilot. Discover, Qualify & Engage your market.
one_liner: People search that works

name: Ergo
long_description: Ergo is AI for sales teams, monitoring customer communication across tools like Zoom, Email, and Slack to keep CRMs such as HubSpot and Salesforce up to date. Ergo’s AI agents execute revenue-generating activities, such as automating mid-funnel follow-ups based on external market signals and past customer interactions. By eliminating manual operational tasks, Ergo helps sales teams maintain active pipelines, prevent deals from stalling, and cut sales cycles in half.
one_liner: AI Agents for Sales Operations

name: Kanava AI
long_description:
Distributors face a shrinking workforce and rising call volume.

Kanava AI builds voice-based agents that act like junior sales reps — starting with routine inbound calls, stock and price checks, field note logging, and CRM updates using live ERP data.

As the system learns from top reps and real workflows, it levels up: managing full sales calls, surfacing upsells, coaching teams, and reactivating dormant accounts.

We help distributors scale sales output without adding headcount — by automating the work reps shouldn’t be doing in the first place.
one_liner: Your First AI Sales Hire for Wholesale Distributors

name: Sixtyfour
long_description: Instantly deploy custom research agents to source and enrich specialized professionals, company data, and insights directly into your existing systems.
one_liner: AI Agents for Research

name: Nomi
long_description:
Nomi provides on-the-spot phrase suggestions, intelligently crafted from your transcribed sales calls and a custom playbook that adapts and grows with you, from founder-led sales to revops mastery. 

PS: We also increase closing rates by 12% on average and free up your sales team's mental energy.
one_liner: Realtime Sales Copilot

name: throxy
long_description:
throxy is building vertical AI agents that book meetings for companies selling into traditional industries like manufacturing, logistics, education, and finance.

Outbound is broken—generic automation gets ignored, and legacy sectors are hard to crack. throxy fixes this by running bespoke, fully-managed outbound systems for sales teams. We combine AI Agents with human experts to deliver hyper-personalised campaigns that consistently generate six-figure qualified pipelines.

Since 2023, throxy has powered outbound for B2B companies, from industrial manufacturers to fintech providers, replacing the need for internal SDR teams or heaps of tools, with a solution that outperforms in both speed and quality.

Our founding team has built AI at JP Morgan, scaled businesses from age 14, and led enterprise sales from Seed to Series D. We’re not just automating outbound, we’re redefining what sales execution looks like in traditional industries.

throxy is the AI SDR purpose-built for the sectors software forgot.
one_liner: Vertical AI agents that run the sales funnel on autopilot

name: Lyra
long_description:
AI notetakers clutter meetings. Multiple tabs separate knowledge.
Lyra brings meetings and work together in one clean workspace.
You can work on docs with AI and your team live, no screenshare required. Create follow-ups and action items as you talk. Ask your meeting questions after the call. Access auto-transcribed calls and instant summaries. Everything stays in one place with full context across every meeting.
one_liner: Tthe final meeting platform.

name: Cohesive
long_description: Cohesive is the agentic CRM for blue collar businesses like janitorial, pressure washing, landscaping, HVAC, and pest control businesses. Cohesive fully automates sales and marketing outreach to local businesses and property owners in the service area, helping local service businesses grow even while servicing clients in the field.
one_liner: The agentic CRM for blue-collar services

name: Orange Slice
long_description:
Orange Slice uses AI agents to crawl the internet for temporal signals/firmographic data that help sales teams find high-intent prospects by continuously monitoring the internet for buying signals and firmographic changes.

Our agents scan millions of data sources - including company websites, news articles, job postings, press releases, and social media - to detect meaningful events such as leadership changes, product launches, funding rounds, hiring trends, and more. These insights are transformed into actionable sales signals that indicate a company’s likelihood to purchase your product.

With Orange Slice, revenue teams can prioritize outreach, personalize messaging, and dramatically improve conversion rates by engaging the right accounts at the right time - based on what’s actually happening, not just static firmographics.
one_liner: AI agents that find you customers who already want to buy

name: Candytrail
long_description: We’re building the optimization platform for in-person sales teams. Our agents capture every customer interaction and surface insights on winning talk tracks, common objections, and revenue drivers. We have already delivered an average 13% lift in revenue for customers in pharma, real estate, and retail.
one_liner: AI agents for in-person sales teams, starting with coaching

name: Paloma
long_description: We unify your contracts, service consumption, and customer relationship context so that your revenue, success and sales teams can operate from the same ground truth. With everything centralized, you can proactively react to customer signals for upsell and churn while billing is seamlessly handled in the background.
one_liner: AI-native CRM for putting post-sales operations on autopilot

name: Leadbay
long_description:
We unlock untapped revenue for sales teams targeting fragmented, data-scarce SMB markets — like construction, hospitality, startups, and retail.

You might think that LinkedIn Sales Nav, Clay, ZoomInfo, or Apollo have you covered. They don’t. They miss 70% of U.S. companies and capture only 0.001% of digital signals or intent. We’re already working with enterprise clients who 5× their prospecting efficiency by simply unlocking hidden opportunities in the most data-scarce, fragmented markets.

How does it look like?
Upload a list of won/lost leads. That’s it. 
Leadbay understands your Ideal Customer Profile, discovers untapped opportunities in your market, and scores your existing dormant accounts. Every day, you’ll receive fresh, high-value prospects right in your mobile or desktop app.

We make invisible companies visible.
one_liner: Discover and qualify SMB leads others can’t find.

name: Imagine AI
long_description:
Imagine AI is a task-based agentic AI that becomes your company's Head of Content. For B2B service firms, this means turning your partners' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to write posts, our AI performs deep research to build a 100-page persona, captures their authentic voice, and automates content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our college-dropout, second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher). The idea for Imagine AI came after a YC partner told us directly: founders and partners at B2B firms are experts at their jobs, but they consistently struggle to turn that expertise into effective marketing that drives revenue.

We launched just 8 weeks ago and have already reached $14k in revenue from 30 paying users, including forward-thinking firms like Conduit (YC '24). The demand is clear, with a 250+ person waitlist. The results are even clearer: one of our first users recently landed a $5M deal that originated from a single post our AI created.

We are displacing the expensive, low-ROI agency model by building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company. 

To see how we automate your pipeline, book a demo at https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost 

or connect with our CEO, Sky Yang, on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/
one_liner: AI agent that handles all of your B2B content needs
